credit_line: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
dimensions:
Width (open): 48.2 cm (19 in.)
Length: 27.6 cm (10 7/8 in.)
title: Fan
description: Leaf: paper, engraved and hand-colored, with maps: "Amerique Septentrionale" and discourse in French on navigators on reverse.  On obverse, Costa Rica and Nicaragua, and French text urging a canal by way of Lake Nicaragua, and a colorful group of figures: "Les Quatre parties du Monde regardant attentivement Mercure, Dieu du Commence". Guards and sticks: ivory with much engraved, silvered detail.
name: Fan
